summary.span: Provides a user interface for browsing the properties of an object.

span.span: Provides a user interface for browsing the properties of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用屬性方格，您建立的新執行個體類別上的父控制項並設定要顯示的屬性的物件。To use the property grid, you create a new instance of the class on a parent control and set to the object to display the properties for. 在方格中顯示的資訊是屬性的快照集時，物件所指派。The information displayed in the grid is a snapshot of the properties at the time the object is assigned. 如果所指定的物件的屬性值變更程式碼在執行階段中，新的值並未顯示在之前的動作會導致重新整理方格的方格中。If a property value of the object specified by the is changed in code at run time, the new value is not displayed until an action is taken in the grid that causes the grid to refresh. 在屬性方格內的屬性索引標籤會顯示為上方的工具列上的按鈕，並會有所不同範圍中定義。The property tabs within the property grid appear as buttons on the toolbar at the top of the , and can vary in scope as defined in the . 您可以使用顯示大型按鈕而非預設的較小的屬性。You can use the property to display large buttons instead of the default smaller ones. 大型按鈕是 32 x 32 像素為單位，而不是標準的 16 x 16 像素為單位。Large buttons are 32-by-32 pixels rather than the standard 16-by-16 pixels. 大型] 和 [小按鈕和屬性清單 expander 圖示 (加號或減號圖示) 時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目根據系統 DPI 設定調整大小：The large and small buttons and the property list expander icons (the plus or minus icons) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 控制一開始未顯示在工具箱 在開發環境中。The control is not initially presented in the toolbox in the development environment. 您可以將屬性方格中加入工具箱 可讓您拖曳拖曳至表單。You can add a property grid to the toolbox, which enables you to drag a onto your form. 您也可以定義的執行個體在原始程式碼中加入適當的程式碼。You can also define an instance of by adding the appropriate code in your source code. 所有公用屬性將顯示在預設。All public properties of the will be displayed in the by default. 您可以隱藏屬性，使它不會顯示在控制項，而將其與並將值設定為`false`。You can hide a property so that it is not displayed in the control by decorating it with the and setting the value to `false`. 您可以指定藉由提供包含類別目錄的屬性會出現在類別。You can specify the category that a property appears in by providing a category with the . 您可以提供描述性文字的底部會顯示您屬性控制項使用。You can provide descriptive text for your property that appears at the bottom of the control by using the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何建立屬性方格和它的位置設定在表單上。The following code example illustrates creating a property grid and setting its location on a form. 這個範例需要您擁有的表單具有在其上。This example requires that you have a form with a on it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將屬性，以反映之屬性的目前狀態的方格中變更的屬性排序按鈕的外觀。When you set the property, the appearance of the property sort buttons on the grid changes to reflect the current state of the property. 設定至會導致要擷取的順序顯示屬性。Setting to causes the properties to be displayed in the order they were retrieved. 設定同時和等同於設定至單獨。Setting to both and is the same as setting to alone. 分類的檢視一律會顯示為依字母順序排列。The categorized view is always shown as alphabetical. > [!NOTE] > 若要執行自訂排序，實作上要依預期順序傳回屬性的元件。To do custom sorting, implement on the component to return the properties in the desired order. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制使用，屬性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control using the , properties. 此外，此範例會設定控制項的屬性`false`讓方格執行範例時，將無法看到。In addition, this example sets the control's property to `false` so the grid will not be visible when the example is run. 貼上下列程式碼會執行此範例，在表單和呼叫`InitializePropertyGrid`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializePropertyGrid` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 若要執行的表單時，請檢視在屬性方格，將變更方格的屬性`true`、 重新編譯，並重新執行的表單。To view the property grid when the form is running, change the grid's property to `true`, recompile, and rerun the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性為了提供 visual Windows Form 控制項之間的相容性呈現文字使用類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂文字轉譯使用類別。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式未從升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎類別中引進了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了提升效能，讓文字看起來比較好，並改善的國際字型支援。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎類別用來執行所有的文字轉譯。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距和自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows Form 應用程式中使用類別來呈現文字中，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解決此不相容，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性`true`特定控制項。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`至`true`應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫具有參數的方法`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.
